office:text.text:p: Approximate Reconstruction of Sequences with a Hierarchical Genetic Algorithm
Plamen Petrov, Georgi Kostadinov, Petar Zhivkov, Veneta Velichkova, Todor Balabanov0000-0003-3139-069X
Institute of Information and Communication Technologies - Bulgarian Academy of Sciences
Emails: p.petrov@iit.bas.bg g.kostadinov@iit.bas.bg pzhivkov@iit.bas.bg vvelichkova@iit.bas.bg todorb@iinf.bas.bg

text:p.text:span: The exact reconstruction of the sequence is not always needed.

office:text.text:p: In the most popular implementation of the genetic algorithms, there is no hierarchical organization of the population.
As a result of the research .
